events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision on the morning of April 30th involving their car and a roadside object.
Based on the description of the incident referencing a car and collision, this claim was categorised as an Auto Accident.
An insurance claims agent was assigned to handle the auto accident case and initiate the claim process.
The customer was promptly notified their auto accident claim had been received and was being processed.
Request made for documents including the police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and driver’s license for verification.
Customer successfully submitted all required documentation, facilitating swift progress on the auto accident claim.
The claims team began investigating the accident details, reviewing photos, and assessing damage reports.
Investigation finalized verifying the accident circumstances and confirming that the claim is valid and eligible.
A settlement offer covering repair costs and vehicle loss was proposed to the customer for review and acceptance.
Customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely handling of their case.
The auto accident claim was officially approved following acceptance of the settlement by the customer.
Payment was issued to the customer’s bank account promptly to cover the agreed settlement amount for their car damages.
The auto accident claim has been successfully closed after disbursing payment and receiving no further inquiries.
All case files and documents related to the vehicle collision claim were archived for future reference.
